price: او ستاسو غوندې هغوى هم ګومان كړى و چې الله به هيڅوك بېرته را ژوندي نه كړي.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّواْ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن يَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahum ẓannū kamā ẓanantum an lan yabʿatha al-lahu aḥadan
